=== Summary ===
Exporting data related to all translation's template for a language in a CSV file make possible to manage it in tools like OOo Calc to make graphics, elaboration and more.

=== Rationale ===
Data related to translation status is a precious information. It who the gap to the perfection and the area where more efforts is needed. Like the UWN, showing graphics of bugs, national UWN may show graph about translation on own language. By the way, that data are interesting to translation leaders to stay in touch with work in progress.
